mapper.select: select id, title, price, img_url, sell_count from t_commodity
select id, title, summary, content, price, img_url, sell_count from t_commodity where id=#{id}
select image from t_commodity where id=#{id}
SELECT id, title, price, img_url, sell_count FROM t_commodity t2 WHERE t2.id NOT IN ( SELECT t.commodity_id FROM t_bought_list t WHERE t.user_id = 1 )
mapper.insert: insert into t_commodity (title, summary, content, price, image, owner_id, img_url, create_time) values(#{title}, #{summary}, #{content}, #{price}, #{image}, #{ownerId}, #{imgUrl}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: update t_commodity set title=#{title}, summary=#{summary}, content=#{content}, price=#{price}, image=#{image}, img_url=#{imgUrl} where id=#{id}
update t_commodity set title=#{title}, summary=#{summary}, content=#{content}, price=#{price} where id=#{id}
update t_commodity set sell_count = sell_count + #{count} where id=#{id}
